tool_description:
Verifies if email address are valid and can be delivered. 
Check email format, host name exist, catch all emails and if the host can accept the email address.
name: Email Delivery Checker
title: Email Delivery Checker

api_list.name: Verify Email
api_list.description:
Checks if email address exist and can be delivered.
Checks the following for each email

- email address valid
- host is valid
- host can accept the email RCPT
- Is this CatchAll host

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Response in JSON or XML format
